songs.title: Good for You (Kasbo Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Selena Gomez]
I'm on my 14 carats
I'm 14-carat
Doing it up like Midas
Hmm

Now you say I got a touch
So good, so good
Make you never wanna leave
So don't, so don't

[Chorus: Selena Gomez]
'Cause I just wanna look good for you, good for you
I just wanna look good for you, good for you
Let me show you how proud I am to be yours
Leave this dress a mess on the floor
And still look good for you, good for you

[Verse 2: Selena Gomez]
I'm on my marquise diamonds
I'm a marquise diamond
Could even make that Tiffany jealous
Hmm

You say I give it to you hard
So bad, so bad
Make you never wanna leave
I won't, I won't

[Pre-Drop: Selena Gomez]
'Cause I just wanna look—

[Drop 1: Selena Gomez & A$AP Rocky]
(Woo)

'Cause I just wanna look

[Chorus: Selena Gomez]
Cause I just wanna look good for you, good for you
I just wanna look good for you, good for you
Let me show you how proud I am to be yours
Leave this dress a mess on the floor
And still look good for you, good for you

[Verse 3: A$AP Rocky]
Hold on, take a minute, love
Cause I ain't trying to mess your image up
Like we mess around in triple cuffs
Stumble 'round town, pull your zipper up
Pants sag like I don't give a—

I ain't trying to mess your business up
And I ain't trying to get you into stuff
But the way you touchin' on me in the club
Rubbin' on my miniature
John Hancock, **** the signature

Any time I hit it, know she finna fall through
And every time we get up, always end up on the news
Ain't worried bout no press and ain't worried bout the next chick
They love the way you dress and ain't got **** up on you

Jackpot, hit the jackpot
Just met a bad miss without the *** shots
You look good, girl, you know you did good, don't you?
You look good, girl, bet it feel good, don't it?

[Pre-Drop: Selena Gomez & A$AP Rocky]
'Cause I just wanna look— (Hahaha)

[Drop 2: Selena Gomez & A$AP Rocky]
(Woo)

'Cause I just wanna look

[Outro: Instrumental]
